mapper.select: SELECT O.OVERDUE_NO , L.BOOK_NO , L.TITLE , L.AUTHOR , L.COMPANY , M.NAME , TO_CHAR(B.BORROW_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') BORROW_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.DUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') DUE_DATE , M.OVERDUE_COUNT , S.BOOK_STATE , BO.B_OPTION , BO.O_NO FROM OVERDUE O JOIN BORROW B ON B.BORROW_NO = O.BORROW_NO JOIN BOOK_STATUS S ON S.STATUS_NO = O.STATUS_NO JOIN BOOK_LIST L ON L.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN (MEMBER M JOIN B_OPTION BO ON BO.O_NO = M.O_NO) ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY O.OVERDUE_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS LISTCOUNT FROM OVERDUE O JOIN BORROW B ON B.BORROW_NO = O.BORROW_NO JOIN BOOK_STATUS S ON S.STATUS_NO = O.STATUS_NO JOIN BOOK_LIST L ON L.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.DEL_YN = 'N'
